alert.locationTips: Your current location has not passed the permission authentication, and the application cannot be used normally; the application is only supported by users in non-Mainland China.

login.inconsistent: The password you entered twice is inconsistent
login.usernameTips: The characters in the username can only be letters or numbers;
login.pswTips: The password must be greater than or equal to 12 digits, and contain both uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and characters;
login.pswNotTips: Once the password is set, it cannot be modified, please keep the set password properly;
